post.content:
And a Professional controller, too

  • by Liam Doolan 37 mins ago

This March will detect CaPCom’s Monster Hunter sequence return to the Swap with the all-new release, Monster Hunter Upward push.

To procure a good time, Nintendo is releasing a “special edition” Swap on 26th March for 38,400 yen (that is the identical date because the launch of the game). The Swap, Pleasure-Con and dock are all precisely themed, and it moreover entails a code for a replica of the game.

Nintendo will moreover provide a Professional Controller (sold one by one). Or no longer it is arriving on the identical day for 7,480 yen. Stamp extra right here.

Reservations for every the console and Professional Controller will birth on 27th February. Within the meanwhile, this methodology has highest been confirmed for Japan. We are going to replace this post if we hear one thing.
